About Me

01

About Me

Hi! I'm Thibaut Tran, I'm a Junior Developer and a 4th-year student at Epitech currently on exchange in South Korea specializing in C/C++ and passionate about building efficient software!
I combine four years of apprenticeship with a rewarding experience at the Direction Générale de l'Armement.

Motivated by the desire to surpass myself, I'm ready to take on technical challenges and actively contribute to your projects as part of a dynamic team!

Professional Skillset

And many more! I invite you to explore my resume for a detailed overview about me.

Resume

Career Journey

02

Work Experiences

C++/QT Developer at Direction Générale de l'Armement

5 month internship where my role was to develop an innovative software suite for the aeronautics industry by using and integrating advanced mastery of military simulation protocols in C++/QT, to reinforce DGA 's strategic projects.

Full-Stack Developer at Klikango

6 month internship where my job was to develop Klikango, an innovative mobile application designed for quick and easy checkout via QR code, providing a seamless user experience.
In parallel, I worked on Klikango Merchant, a dedicated mobile app that enables merchants to efficiently manage their inventory and track QR code transactions in real time.
Additionally, I implemented Panel Admin, a centralized dashboard that offers staff full control and intuitive management of the application.

Front-end Developer as Freelance

1 month of complete redesign of the Front-end of a delivery service application, optimizing user experience and performance, in a model similar to Uber Eats.

Resume

Projects

03

AREA (Action REAction)

Development of a SAAS () platform (Web, Mobile, API) enabling users to create and manage workflows that connect different apps and services, similar to IFTTT or Zapier. The platform allows for the creation of automation scenarios to streamline processes and improve efficiency.

Cryptography

Designed and implemented a suite of encryption and decryption algorithms, showcasing expertise in modern cryptographic techniques. This includes XOR for basic obfuscation and data masking, AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) for robust symmetric encryption, RSA (Rivest–Shamir–Adleman) for secure asymmetric encryption, and PGP (Pretty Good Privacy), a hybrid encryption approach combining RSA and AES to ensure data confidentiality and integrity.

Minishell

Development of a Linux shell interpreter that replicates core Unix/Linux shell functionalities, including command execution, input/output redirection, process management, piping and much more ! The project demonstrates proficiency in System programming, Process handling, and the effective use of POSIX APIs, showcasing skills in low-level programming and Unix shell design.

R-Type

Development of an innovative network Game Engine, designed to be reusable and modular with optimized graphics. This engine enabled the creation of two iconic games, R-Type and Pong, showcasing its flexibility and efficiency in developing online multiplayer games. The project highlights expertise in game engine design, graphical optimization, and network communication management.

Feel free to reach out if you’d like to connect or discuss potential collaborations! You can also send me an email at Thibaut.tran@epitech.eu

About This Portfolio

To build my portfolio and push my boundaries, I ventured into the realm of 3D web design. After hours of scrolling, I stumbled upon the portfolio of Bokoko33 .
Inspired by his remarkable work, I reimagined the concept with my own creative vision, crafting a unique and immersive experience.
